Parameter.Name: MhIfOrderBookUniqueOrderIds
Parameter.Comment: This must be set to false if order book is used.

Parameter.Name: TsxRetransMaxQueueSize
Parameter.Comment: Maximum retrans queue size to keep. Older retrans request will be discarded if this limit is reached. Set to 0 to have no limit.

Parameter.Name: TsxL2ProductName
Parameter.Comment: Defaults to TSXLevel2.

Parameter.Name: TsxL2ProductNameOrderBook
Parameter.Comment: Defaults to TSXLevel2Book. (Board Lot)

Parameter.Name: TsxL2ProductNameTopOfBook
Parameter.Comment: Defaults to TSXLevel2Top. (Board Lot)

Parameter.Name: TsxL2ProductNameTrade
Parameter.Comment: Defaults to TSXLevel2Trade.

Parameter.Name: TsxL2OddLotProductNameOrderBook
Parameter.Comment: Defaults to TSXLevel2OddLotBook.

Parameter.Name: TsxL2OddLotProductNameTopOfBook
Parameter.Comment: Defaults to TSXLevel2OddLotTop.

Parameter.Name: TsxL2SpecialTermsProductNameOrderBook
Parameter.Comment: Defaults to TSXLevel2SpecialTermsBook.

Parameter.Name: TsxL2SpecialTermsProductNameTopOfBook
Parameter.Comment: Defaults to TSXLevel2SpecialTermsTop.

Parameter.Name: TsxL2ProductName
Parameter.Comment: Defaults to TSXLevel2.

Parameter.Name: TsxL2ProductNameOrderBook
Parameter.Comment: Defaults to TSXLevel2Book.

Parameter.Name: TsxL2ProductNameTopOfBook
Parameter.Comment: Defaults to TSXLevel2Top.

Parameter.Name: TsxL2ProductNameTrade
Parameter.Comment: Defaults to TSXLevel2Trade.

Parameter.Name: TsxL2OddLotProductNameOrderBook
Parameter.Comment: Defaults to TSXLevel2OddLotBook.

Parameter.Name: TsxL2OddLotProductNameTopOfBook
Parameter.Comment: Defaults to TSXLevel2OddLotTop.

Parameter.Name: TsxL2SpecialTermsProductNameOrderBook
Parameter.Comment: Defaults to TSXLevel2SpecialTermsBook.

Parameter.Name: TsxL2SpecialTermsProductNameTopOfBook
Parameter.Comment: Defaults to TSXLevel2SpecialTermsTop.

Parameter.Name: TsxL2ProductName
Parameter.Comment: Defaults to TSXLevel2.

Parameter.Name: TsxL2ProductNameOrderBook
Parameter.Comment: Defaults to TSXLevel2Book. (Board Lot)

Parameter.Name: TsxL2ProductNameTopOfBook
Parameter.Comment: Defaults to TSXLevel2Top. (Board Lot)

Parameter.Name: TsxL2ProductNameTrade
Parameter.Comment: Defaults to TSXLevel2Trade.

Parameter.Name: TsxL2OddLotProductNameOrderBook
Parameter.Comment: Defaults to TSXLevel2OddLotBook.

Feed.Comment: tsxl2 feed is configured to receive TL2 and CL2 from the Quantum RTMD platform
Feed.Name: tsxl2

Feed.Comment: tsxl2_rtmd feed is configured to receive TL2 and CL2 from the RTMD platform
Feed.Name: tsxl2_rtmd

Parameter.Name: ExtractHint
Parameter.Comment: Used to identify the feed in the metadata

Parameter.Name: PlaybackSourceId
Parameter.Comment: 239.142.2.3 and 239.142.1.3 are the old private IPs, here for compatibility with older playback files.

Parameter.Name: TsxUseQuantumRecovery
Parameter.Comment: Set to true if the retransmission server(s) are on the Quantum platform (QRTMD)
